trains
Class CircuitView

java.lang.Object
  trains.CircuitView

public class CircuitView
extends java.lang.Object

Stores the view (members, who joined, who departed) of the circuit. Notice that if joined (respectively departed) is false, a new process has joined (respectively left) the list of processes members of the circuit (thus participating to the trains protocol). In this case, the address found in joined (respectively departed cannot be found in members.

Author:
Stephanie Ouillon
